author: Anthony Boadle
title: After smallpox and malaria, Brazil's tribes fear coronavirus is next lethal import
description: When Europeans first arrived in the Amazon rainforest, their smallpox decimated local tribes. Then rubber tappers, gold miners and settlers brought malaria, measles and influenza.
content:
BRASILIA (Reuters) - When Europeans first arrived in the Amazon rainforest, their smallpox decimated local tribes. Then rubber tappers, gold miners and settlers brought malaria, measles and influenza. 
Now many of Brazil’s 850,000 indigenous people, fearing … [+4134 chars]
